summary: This bill, the Office of Fossil Energy and Carbon Management Relocation Act of 2025, mandates the Secretary of Energy to relocate the Office of Fossil Energy and Carbon Management from Washington, D.C., to Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania by December 31, 2026. A subsequent report to Congress is required, detailing employee attrition related to the relocation and how the Secretary will address it. The report also addresses the relocation's impact on employee's ability to negotiate working conditions.
